metadata.description: He just happened to be in the cafe my friend and I walked into. I won't love Hanawa-san. He is the spitting image of a childhood friend I was in love with. I can't love him. These are the thoughts of Toono Nozomi, a high school student. However, with just one kiss, Nozomi's heart betrays him...------------Translated by Alesha Mrazek; Edited by Alesha Mrazek & Fluffy; Lettered by Fluffy
metadata.name: The Reason Why He Loves Him So Much
